review: This FIRE TV is awesome! I've used ROKU 2 for 2 years and it was good but the FIRE TV blows it out of the water. Do not get it just for what it does but for what it could do. It's really fast and the microphone works great, although I wish it worked on other apps not just on Amazon prime platform.

review: I really liked this unit. It is fast and work beautifully, except of Hulu which doesn't work at all. It will work for a while and then the sound plays, but only black screen. It has been that way from the beginning and Hulu blames your internet provider or Amazon and vice versa. So If you watch hulu a lot this will not work for you.
